# MarketplaceV3Offers.acceptOffer() method

Accept an offer

## Example

```javascript
// The ID of the offer you want to accept
const offerId = 0;

await contract.offers.acceptOffer(offerId);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
acceptOffer(offerId: BigNumberish): Promise<TransactionResult>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description  |
| --------- | ------------ | ------------ |
| offerId   | BigNumberish | The offer id |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[TransactionResult](./sdk.transactionresult.md)&gt;

the transaction receipt
